message: Ei matro police satkaniar hasmoter dokaner kase raju ara begm namer ek mohilake matay goli kore and bole tur karoney ekane sob gotona hosse oi mohilake protome keranihater assefa hospitale vorti kora hoy obostar obonito howay chittagong er hospitale niye jawa hosse okanteke 7 jonke greftar kora hoyese
